scripts.flatten: truffle-flattener contracts/OdcToken.sol > flatten-contracts/OdcToken.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/MockBEP20.sol > flatten-contracts/MockBEP20.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/SyrupBar.sol > flatten-contracts/SyrupBar.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/MasterChef.sol > flatten-contracts/MasterChef.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/MasterChefV2.sol > flatten-contracts/MasterChefV2.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/SousChef.sol > flatten-contracts/SousChef.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/OdcPool.sol > flatten-contracts/OdcPool.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/OdcFlexiblePool.sol > flatten-contracts/OdcFlexiblePool.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/OpensaleProfile.sol > flatten-contracts/OpensaleProfile.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/SmartChefFactory.sol > flatten-contracts/SmartChefFactory.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/SmartChefInitializable.sol > flatten-contracts/SmartChefInitializable.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/BnbStaking.sol > flatten-contracts/BnbStaking.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/OpensaleFinanceLottery.sol > flatten-contracts/OpensaleFinanceLottery.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/RandomNumberGenerator.sol > flatten-contracts/RandomNumberGenerator.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/Launcher.sol > flatten-contracts/Launcher.sol && node flatten_fix.js
scripts.flatten-owner: truffle-flattener contracts/NakamotoFactory.sol > flatten-contracts/NakamotoFactory.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/NakamotoRouter.sol > flatten-contracts/NakamotoRouter.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/NakamotoProfile.sol > flatten-contracts/NakamotoProfile.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/NakamotoPair.sol > flatten-contracts/NakamotoPair.sol && node flatten_fix.js
